settings.title: Thank You for Being Part of Our Story
settings.subheading: We’re Closing Our Doors — Enjoy Up to 70% Off

settings.title: Arthur & Claire
settings.text:
Our journey with Arthur & Claire New York began with a simple dream: to create something meaningful. We’ve always shared a love for fashion, craftsmanship, and building a space that felt personal and inspiring. Over the years, our store became more than a boutique — it became a place filled with conversations, connections, and unforgettable moments.

With heavy hearts, we’ve made the decision to close our doors.

It wasn’t an easy choice, but we take it with deep gratitude. Grateful for every customer, every kind word, every person who became part of our story.

To say goodbye in the most honest way, we are holding a closure sale — a final thank-you to everyone who supported us and believed in what we created.

From the bottom of our hearts, thank you.

At Lisa & Peter London, we are already embracing the brand-new autumn collection. We make sure to always provide high-quality products and stylish choices, so you can step into the season looking your best in the latest trends.

Browse our products below and explore the full collections.
